p: M. pulegium plants were harvested in June-July 2019 in three different areas of Sicily (Italy): Isola Lunga (Marsala, TP), Castellana Sicula (Palermo), and Castronovo di Sicilia (Palermo) ( Figure 1). Prof. Francesco Maria Raimondo carried out the taxonomic identification. Details of M. pulegium samples are shown in Table 4.
